customer.password_number_required_error: Password needs to contain a number
customer.reset_password_before_login_error: Sign-in is currently unavailable. You will receive an e-mail in the next 5 minutes with instructions for resetting your password. If you don't receive this e-mail, please check your junk mail folder or contact us for further assistance.
customer.sign_in_error: The email or password you entered is not valid.
customer.sign_in_throttled_error: Due to excessive login attempts, please wait 10 seconds before attempting to log in again.
customer.sign_out_error: An error occurred while signing out. Please try again.
customer.subscribe_to_newsletter_text: Yes, I'd like to receive updates.

login_email.error_server: We couldn't send you a sign-in link. Please try again.
login_email.error_not_found: The entered email is not associated to an account. Please try with a different email.
login_email.sent_text: We’ve sent an email to {email} that contains a sign-in link. This will expire in {minutes} minutes - If you don’t see it in your inbox, check your junk folder.
login_email.text: Enter the email address associated to your account. We will send you a sign-in link.

login_email.resend_link: Didn't get the email? Resend the link

embedded_checkout.unsupported_error: The following payment methods are not supported by Embedded Checkout: {methods}. Please contact us for assistance.

payment.affirm_body_text: You will be redirected to Affirm to securely complete your purchase. Just fill out a few pieces of basic information and get a real-time decision. Checking your eligibility won't affect your credit score.
payment.credit_card_cvv_help_text: For VISA and Mastercard, the CVV is a three-digit code printed on the back. For American Express it is the four-digit code printed on the front. The CVV is a security measure to ensure that you are in possession of the card.
payment.credit_card_expiration_invalid_error: Expiration date must be a valid future date in MM / YY format
payment.credit_card_number_invalid_error: Credit Card Number must be valid
payment.credit_card_number_last_four: Enter card number for {cardType} ending in {lastFour}
payment.credit_card_number_mismatch_error: The card number entered does not match the card stored in your account
payment.payment_error: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again.
payment.payment_method_disabled_error: The selected payment method is no longer valid. Click OK to see the most up-to-date payment methods.
payment.payment_method_invalid_error: There's a problem processing your payment. Please contact us for assistance or choose another payment method.
payment.payment_method_unavailable_error: This payment provider is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
payment.payment_not_required_text: Payment is not required for this order.
payment.place_order_error: There was an error placing your order. Please contact us.
payment.instrument_manage_modal_confirmation_lab: Are you sure you want to delete this stored payment method?
payment.instrument_manage_modal_empty_text: You do not have any stored payment methods.
payment.instrument_manage_delete_server_error: There was an error when attempting to delete that stored payment method, please try again.
payment.instrument_manage_delete_auth_error: There was a problem authorizing your request. Please try signing in again
payment.instrument_manage_delete_client_error: There was an error when attempting to delete the stored payment method: payment method no longer exists or cannot be deleted.
payment.instrument_save_payment_method_label: Save this card for future transactions
payment.account_instrument_save_payment_method_l: Save this account for future transactions
payment.account_instrument_new_shipping_address:
We noticed this is a new shipping address.

For security reasons, you will need to re-link your PayPal account when shipping to an address for the first time or if the shipping address was edited recently.
payment.instrument_trusted_shipping_address_text: This additional security step is applied to your card when shipping to an address for the first time or if the shipping address was edited recently.
payment.instrument_trusted_shipping_address_titl: Please re-enter your card number to authorize this transaction.
payment.stripe_sepa_mandate_disclaimer: By providing your IBAN and confirming this payment, you authorise (A) {storeUrl} and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and (B) your bank to debit your account in accordance with those instructions. You are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within eight weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.

order_confirmation.order_pending_review_text: Your order was sent to us but is currently awaiting payment. Once we receive the payment for your order, it will be completed. If you've already provided payment details then we will process your order manually and send you an email when it's completed.
order_confirmation.order_pending_status_text: We've received your order and are processing your payment. Once the payment is verified, your order will be completed. We will send you an email when it's completed. Please note, this process may take a few minutes depending on the processing times of your chosen method. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_incomplete_status_text: We’ve received your order and payment. Your order is now being processed by our system. Please note, processing may take a few minutes. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_with_downloadable_digital_items_te: You can download your digital purchases by clicking the links on this page, or by logging into your account at any time. There is also a download link in your confirmation email, which should be arriving shortly.
order_confirmation.order_with_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail} or call us at {supportPhoneNumber}.
order_confirmation.order_without_downloadable_digital_items: Once we receive your payment, we’ll send a confirmation email with a link to download your digital purchases.
order_confirmation.order_without_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_status_update_facebook_messenger_h: Get instant updates of your order to Messenger

redeem.heading: Utiliser bon cadeau
redeem.intro: Pour utiliser un bon cadeau chez {store_name}, suivez ces étapes ci-dessous.
redeem.item1: Vous avez besoin du code unique, qui fait partie du bon cadeau qui vous a été envoyé par e-mail en pièce jointe. Ce sera un code de ce type: Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Parcourez le site et ajoutez des articles à votre panier comme vous le feriez normalement.
redeem.item3: Cliquez sur le lien 'Afficher panier' pour voir le contenu de votre panier.
redeem.item4: Saisissez le code de votre bon cadeau dans la case 'Utiliser bon cadeau' et cliquez sur 'Suivant'.

balance.heading: Vérifier le solde du bon cadeau
balance.intro: Vous pouvez vérifier le solde d'un bon cadeau en tapant le code dans le champ suivant.

created.heading: Votre compte a été créé
created.intro: Merci d'avoir créé votre compte sur {store_name}. Les détails de votre compte ont été envoyés par e-mail à {email}

reset_password.intro: Saisissez votre adresse e-mail pour demander un nouveau mot de passe. Un e-mail sera envoyé à l'adresse ci-dessous avec un lien pour vérifier l'adresse e-mail.

rss.intro: Les flux RSS sont utilisés pour diffuser du contenu qui change régulièrement sur un site Web, y compris celui-ci. Vous pouvez ouvrir un flux RSS avec un lecteur RSS et l'utiliser pour voir s'il y a du nouveau contenu sur ce site, ou vous pouvez configurer des scripts côté serveur pour analyser le flux et l'afficher sur votre site Web..
rss.heading: Distribution RSS

blog.heading: Entrées de blog récentes
blog.intro: Le flux de messages récents contient les {limit} derniers articles de blog publiés sur {store}.

new.heading: Nouveaux produits
new.intro: Le dernier flux de produits contient les derniers {limit} produits ajoutés à {store}.

popular.heading: Produits populaires
popular.intro: Le flux de produits les plus populaires contient les {limit} produits les plus populaires de {store} selon les notes des utilisateurs.

featured.heading: Produits sélectionnés
featured.intro: Le flux de produits sélectionnés contient les {limit} produits sélectionnés dans {store}.

search.heading: Recherche de produits
search.intro1: Les flux de recherche de produits vous permettent d'enregistrer vos recherches de produits personnalisées sous la forme d'un flux de syndication qui sera toujours mis à jour lorsqu'il y a de nouveaux résultats.
search.intro2: Pour créer un flux de recherche de produits, effectuez une recherche standard sur {store} en bas de la page, cliquez sur l'une des options de distribution.

forms.range: Vous devez remplir des nombres compris entre: {limitTo} et {limitFrom}

contact_us.successful: Nous avons reçu vos commentaires et nous vous répondrons dans les plus brefs délais si nécessaire. Continue.
